description:
When you're short on space, this side release bottle cage makes it easy to stay hydrated without needing a bulky hydration pack.  Made from recycled fishing nets, the ReGrip Side-Entry bottle cage takes a little plastic out of the ocean and puts it to use on your bike.

  • Side release design needs less room, great for smaller frames, full-suspension bikes, and bikes with frame bags
  • Bottle lock-ridge securely holds any standard sized bottle
  • Large side opening makes grabbing and returning your bottle easy
  • Right side entry
name: Cannondale ReGrip Side-Entry Right Water Bottle Cage
